name: A Mechanic's Guide to Window Making
name_original: A Mechanic's Guide to Window Making
description:
A short crafting game about an experienced mechanic in his own workshop. With 33 types of items to create and collect, A Mechanic's Guide to Window Making is a point-and-click game about experimentation and discovery.

I would appreciate any feedback since I would like to improve for future game projects.

All code, art, sound effects and music were created within 72 hours for Mini Game Jam 121.

Things to try in the game:

  • make a cup of tea
  • make some robots
  • make gunpowder
